name: Take Your Chance
description:
A low probability for success is no excuse not even trying. What is this?

This is something inbetween a game, a simulation, and an interactive experience.
It is about juggling with probabilities and taking chances. Once set up, you can run the simulation and see, how the chance unfolds.

Why does this exist?

I had a chance. I did not take it.
I made this game to process that.

How do I play it?
  1. Set up probability of interest: Not everyone is interested in a chance. This describes how likely it is that someone else would like to take the chance.
  2. Set up probability of success: If you or someone else decides to take the chance, this is the probability of successfully seizing the chance.
  3. (Optional) Set up sample size: After you had the possibility of taking the chance, how many people come after you. Set to infinity if 0 or empty.
  4. Press Play
  5. Decide: Do you take your chance?
  6. Watch how everything unfolds
  7. Use the "R"-Button to reset the scenario.
